name: Survive! Demo
description:
This is a demo version of the newest game we're working on, Survive! A fast-paced, shoot-em-up game where you survive against a everlasting wave of, not so ordinary zombies. They can pick guns and shoot, recover from health packs, or even throw bombs back at you! Can you survive this madness?

Please provide your feedback here, as this is a demo version, to make sure we can create the best version of this game!

INSTRUCTIONS

  1. WASD: Movement.
  2. Right-click: Shoot.
  3. E: Pick-up items.
